text: Report to the Commissioner is a 1975 American crime drama movie directed by Milton Katselas and based on the novel of the same name by James Mills. It stars Yaphet Kotto, Michael Moriarty, Richard Gere, Susan Blakely, Hector Elizondo and William Devane and was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * Category:1975 crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in New York City Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:Movies about the New York City Police Department
title: Report to the Commissioner
